author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...HONE CONTINUES TO MEANDER NEAR THE INTERNATIONAL DATE LINE....
summary:
...HONE CONTINUES TO MEANDER NEAR THE INTERNATIONAL DATE LINE....
 As of 8:00 AM HST Sat Aug 31
 the center of Hone was located near 22.4, -176.2
 with movement WNW at 2 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 1007 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 40 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Hone (CP1/CP012024)
